text.english: Theorem: \(\texttt{app}\) of a list \(l_1\) and the empty list \([]\) is equal to \(l_1\), i.e. \[ \l_1 in L_A .\; \texttt{app}(l_1,[]) = l_1 \]
text.italiano: Teorema: \(\texttt{app}\) di una lista \(l_1\) e la lista vuota \([]\) Ã¨ equivalente a \(l_1\), i.e. \[ \forall l_1 \in L_A .\; \texttt{app}(l_1, []) = l_1 \]

theorem.coq: Theorem app_empty : forall l1 : list, app l1 [] = l1.
